backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining types (StudentProfile, Course, Enrollment, UserProfile) and CRUD operations for student, course, and enrollment management with role-based access control (admin/user permissions).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features for student management, course management, student detail view, enrollment interface, and visual design theme with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose and functionality, including pages, components, hooks, and styling configurations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm, trustworthy education-themed color system using OKLCH color space for both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with title 'LORDSON Edu' and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, students, courses, and detail pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider with toast notifications.
Dialog component with form for creating new courses, collecting course name, code, description, credit hours, and professor with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/AddStudentDialog: Dialog component with form for creating new student profiles, collecting full name, date of birth, and grade level with StudentStatus enum integration and validation.
frontend/src/components/CourseList.tsx: Displays a table of all courses with navigation to course details and an 'Add Course' button that opens AddCourseDialog. Shows loading state and empty state with icon when no courses exist.
frontend/src/components/EnrollStudentDia: Dialog component for enrolling a student in a course with dropdowns for student and course selection. Validates against duplicate enrollments and supports pre-selected student/course IDs.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout with header (logo, navigation links, login button), responsive mobile menu, footer, and profile setup dialog trigger. Wraps all page content.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states. Clears query cache on logout and handles authentication errors.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name for profile creation. Cannot be dismissed until profile is saved.
frontend/src/components/StudentDetailVie: Displays detailed student information card and a table of enrolled courses with grades. Includes button to open enrollment dialog for adding new course enrollments.
frontend/src/components/StudentList.tsx: Displays a table of all students with navigation to student details and an 'Add Student' button that opens AddStudentDialog. Shows loading state and empty state when no students exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor instance for backend communication, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all CRUD operations on students, courses, enrollments, and user profiles, with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm education-themed color palette for both light and dark modes, including primary blues, accent oranges, and chart colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CourseDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed course information and enrolled students table with enrollment management, requiring authentication and fetching course data by courseId from route params.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Simple page component that renders the CourseList component for authenticated users or shows a login prompt.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section and feature cards linking to student and course management sections, with conditional rendering based on authentication status.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDetailPage.tsx: Page component that displays detailed information for a single student by ID, with authentication checks, loading states, error handling, and navigation back to the student list.
frontend/src/pages/StudentsPage.tsx: Page component that renders the student list view with authentication guard, showing an alert if user is not logged in.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, typography, animations, and design tokens for the education platform UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the multi-tenant education platform's architecture, completed features (student/course management interfaces), pending feature requests (role-based dashboards, staff directories), and design requirements.
